description:
1. This Cisco video training course covers the material needed for the 300-101 Cisco ROUTE exam with more on real-world experience and detailed technical details with more Hands on labs.
  2. This course is lab-based and is focused on the technologies from Cisco CCNP Route/Switch (300-101).
  3. Each Video is designed assist you in creating and verifying Cisco networks using GNS3 1.x
  4. All of this can be done on a single computer without external hardware (no physical routers or switches required).
  5. provides training on how to create a practice environment for individuals interested in mastering networking technology through practising hands on!
title: CCNP Route -300-101
